Test Name: Pompe Disease Full Gene Analysis (GAA gene sequencing)
Purpose: To sequence the entire GAA gene to detect mutations associated with Pompe Disease for diagnostic interpretation.
Container: Not specified in SOP (typically an EDTA blood collection tube)
Equipment: DNA extraction system, spectrophotometer/Qubit fluorometer, thermal cycler, agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus, BioAnalyzer/TapeStation, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) platform
